programme.title: The forgotten William Le Queux
programme.short_synopsis: The death of Kim Philby and the influence of Edwardian spy writer William Le Queux.
programme.medium_synopsis: On hearing of the death of double agent Kim Philby (1912 -1988), Cooke reflects on the influence of forgotten Edwardian spy writer William Le Queux (1864-1927).

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
